mapper.select: select worker_number from worker where worker_number = #{workerNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into worker (worker_Name, worker_Number, worker_Area, worker_Group, worker_City, worker_Phone) VALUES (#{workerName}, #{workerNumber}, #{workerArea}, #{workerGroup}, #{workerCity}, #{workerPhone})
mapper.update: update worker set worker_name = #{workerName}, worker_area = #{workerArea}, worker_Group = #{workerGroup}, worker_city = #{workerCity}, worker_phone = #{workerPhone} where worker_id = #{bindUser}
